import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function UpdateUser() { const [Name, setName] = useState('') const [mail, setMail] = useState('') const [Phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [ID, setID] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const HandleUpdate = (id) =>{ fetch(`http://localhost:3033/update/${id}`, { method: 'PUT', }) .then(res => res.json()) alert("Are you sure to update?") .then(data => console.log(data)) .then(()=>{navigate('/')}) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
